title: Coinbase Global’s Shares Succumb to Crypto Rout
sub_head: Cryptocurrency exchange’s stock hits all-time low as investors retreat further from risky assets
body:
Coinbase Global Inc.’s stock dropped to its lowest level ever as part of Monday’s cryptocurrency malaise.
The cryptocurrency exchange’s shares fell 11% to $52.01, below their previous closing low of $53.72 reached in May. Bitcoin slid to its lowest level in 18 months, and ethereum, another popular digital money, lost more than a quarter of its value in recent trading.
